section.p: The template supports the content sof the Drug Accountability domain. It allows entry of a wide range of data related to the drugs used in a study. It is intended for use in tracking the receipt, dispensing, return, and packaging of the study drug. However, the SDTM IG notes that a) one way a sponsor may choose to distinguish between different types of medications (e.g., study medication, rescue medication, run-in medication) is to use DACAT, and b) DAREFID and DASPID are both available for capturing label information.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:804)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:805)

SHALL contain [1..3] id (CONF:806)
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of drug accountability items. [SDTM: DASEQ, DAREFID, DASPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:807), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Drug Accountability Finding Set C78732 STATIC (CONF:808)
A coded value that indentifies the drug accountability item whose value is being conveyed. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: DATESTCD, DATEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:809)
Used to indicate whether the activity - recording the drug accountability value - did occur. Use statusCode "Completed" if the use occurred. [SDTM: DASTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime with data type TS (CONF:810)
The date/time of the accountability assessment. [SDTM: DADTC]

SHOULD contain [0..3] value (CONF:811)
Captures the drug accountability value. The finding may be recorded as a coded value - if the result is character based - or as a physical quantity - if the result is numeric. Each form for the result is collected as a separate observation - up to three may be valued. [SDTM: DAORRES, DAORRESU, DASTRESC, DASTRESN, DASTRESU]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:812)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:813)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the drug accountability item.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.42)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:814)
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the drug accountability item.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:815)
Used to record the study day associated with an activity taking place during a single day.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Event Study Day (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.37)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:816)
The record of a category to be used in organizing information items.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.20)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:817)
The record of a sub-category to be used in organizing information items.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Sub- Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.91)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:818)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:819)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:820)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:821)
Allows recording of additional findings related to the event.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Finding About (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.40)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:804)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:805)

SHALL contain [1..3] id (CONF:806)
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of drug accountability items. [SDTM: DASEQ, DAREFID, DASPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:807), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Drug Accountability Finding Set C78732 STATIC (CONF:808)
A coded value that indentifies the drug accountability item whose value is being conveyed. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: DATESTCD, DATEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:809)
Used to indicate whether the activity - recording the drug accountability value - did occur. Use statusCode "Completed" if the use occurred. [SDTM: DASTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime with data type TS (CONF:810)
The date/time of the accountability assessment. [SDTM: DADTC]

SHOULD contain [0..3] value (CONF:811)
Captures the drug accountability value. The finding may be recorded as a coded value - if the result is character based - or as a physical quantity - if the result is numeric. Each form for the result is collected as a separate observation - up to three may be valued. [SDTM: DAORRES, DAORRESU, DASTRESC, DASTRESN, DASTRESU]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:812)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:813)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.42)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the drug accountability item.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:814)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the drug accountability item.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:815)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Event Study Day (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.37)
Used to record the study day associated with an activity taking place during a single day.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:816)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.20)
The record of a category to be used in organizing information items.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:817)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Sub- Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.91)
The record of a sub-category to be used in organizing information items.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:818)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:819)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:820)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:821)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Finding About (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.40)
Allows recording of additional findings related to the event.
